verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: blasted] [ARG1: OPEC] [ARGM-TMP: again] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG2: for the spike in oil prices that threatens to slow America 's cruising economy and anger voters before the midterm election] .
